activities: Ball Corporation receives or may receive personal data pertaining to employees, job applicants, potential customers and customers from its affiliates and subsidiaries in European Union member countries and Switzerland to engage in human resources management (including recruiting, hiring, and managing the work force); customer relationship management and administration (including to provide products to customers and to conduct sales and marketing for products); and to monitor compliance with applicable laws, policies and procedures.
corpofftitle1: Senior Vice President, Human Resources and Administration
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Off-line, on-line, human resources and customer data.
recoursemech: Ball Corporation agrees to cooperate with the EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) with respect to human resources data.  For all other types of data: American Arbitration Association (AAA)
